name: Rootflight
description:
You controll an caravan on the run from a vicious root monster. The monster vill forever lumber towards you while sending out roots to kill you. Settle you camp to build tower to chase away the roots, but be carefull. if you stay to long in one place the monster will catch up with you.

Credits:

Krocgar / Nils Erling Hårstadsveen,

Brage Pedersen,

Trygve Eide Igesund,

Gorm Osbord,

Anders L. Hurum,

Jared Anders Isaksen
